docs.snippet: LEAD: Making a trade in the National Basketball Association may be more difficult than in most other sports. It requires a conference call between the trading teams and the league office, and after an agreement has been reached a computer determin...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Making a trade in the National Basketball Association may be more difficult than in most other sports. It requires a conference call between the trading teams and the league office, and after an agreement has been reached a computer determines whether either team would exceed its salary cap by making the trade.

headline.main: OPENING SALVOS ARE FIRED ON N.B.A.'S CONTRACT

docs.snippet: LEAD: Robert Wilson is best known for the conception, direction and design of his own visionary spectacles, from ''Deafman Glance'' to ''Einstein on the Beach'' to ''The Civil Wars.'' But now he is venturing into the staging of the classics. He ha...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Robert Wilson is best known for the conception, direction and design of his own visionary spectacles, from ''Deafman Glance'' to ''Einstein on the Beach'' to ''The Civil Wars.'' But now he is venturing into the staging of the classics. He had already done Marc-Antoine Charpentier's Baroque opera ''Medee'' in Lyons, and, just last month, Gluck's ''Alceste'' in Stuttgart.

headline.main: OPERA: 'SALOME' IN MILAN, STAGED BY ROBERT WILSON

byline.original: By JOHN ROCKWELL, Special to the New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD: It could be viewed as a comfortable family gathering, or as a glittering assembly of stars. Last night 450 people in evening clothes gathered at the Metropolitan Museum of Art for a dignified fashion awards ceremony followed by a home-style ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: It could be viewed as a comfortable family gathering, or as a glittering assembly of stars. Last night 450 people in evening clothes gathered at the Metropolitan Museum of Art for a dignified fashion awards ceremony followed by a home-style meat loaf dinner. The atmosphere was both stylish and glamorous, the kind of mixture the fashion industry manages to pull off with panache.

headline.main: FOR FASHION, A GLITTERING NIGHT OF HONORS

docs.snippet: LEAD: The trial of a Manhattan gas station owner charged with cheating the state of $4 million in sales taxes begins today in Brooklyn....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The trial of a Manhattan gas station owner charged with cheating the state of $4 million in sales taxes begins today in Brooklyn.

headline.main: 4-Million Fraud Trial Begins in U.S. Court

docs.snippet: LEAD: Wall Streeters with long memories had even more reason than most investors last week to cheer the new year's bullish burst that took the Dow Jones industrial average past 2,000 for the first time. Since 1950, early January gains have proved ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Wall Streeters with long memories had even more reason than most investors last week to cheer the new year's bullish burst that took the Dow Jones industrial average past 2,000 for the first time. Since 1950, early January gains have proved to be the forerunner of advances for the entire year in 20 out of 22 instances.

docs.snippet: LEAD: INTAR: THE CREATIVE PROCESS To produce a musical creation for the theater, says Graciela Daniele, it is necessary to collaborate. For the 20-year-old Intar Hispanic America Arts Center, Ms. Daniele is conducting a series of workshops emphasi...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: INTAR: THE CREATIVE PROCESS To produce a musical creation for the theater, says Graciela Daniele, it is necessary to collaborate. For the 20-year-old Intar Hispanic America Arts Center, Ms. Daniele is conducting a series of workshops emphasizing teamwork. In the workshops are playwrights, lyricists and composers who spend a week together thrashing out the details of the creative aspects of producing a musical.

docs.snippet: LEAD: In 1968, Jiri Menzel's ''Closely Watched Trains'' - a compassionately funny tale of a railway crew in Nazi-occupied Bohemia - won the Academy Award for the best foreign-language film. The Czech director remembers that it was a turbulent time...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In 1968, Jiri Menzel's ''Closely Watched Trains'' - a compassionately funny tale of a railway crew in Nazi-occupied Bohemia - won the Academy Award for the best foreign-language film. The Czech director remembers that it was a turbulent time in America and that he received the Oscar two days after the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr.

docs.snippet: LEAD: THE concert scene is beginning to emerge from its holiday hibernation, the Emelin Theater leading the way with three major recitals this week, and at least four major events vying for your attention next Sunday afternoon....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE concert scene is beginning to emerge from its holiday hibernation, the Emelin Theater leading the way with three major recitals this week, and at least four major events vying for your attention next Sunday afternoon.

docs.snippet: LEAD: JAZZ GUITARIST AT 'Y' Barney Kessel had played jazz guitar with celebrity musicians for more than 40 years and had recorded 50 albums before he appeared in New York City for the first time as a headliner on his own....

docs.snippet: LEAD: Bill Tynes, the founder and the artistic director of the New Amsterdam Theater Company, died yesterday morning at his parents' home in Placentia, Calif., of complications from acquired immune deficiency syndrome, his mother said. He was 30 y...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Bill Tynes, the founder and the artistic director of the New Amsterdam Theater Company, died yesterday morning at his parents' home in Placentia, Calif., of complications from acquired immune deficiency syndrome, his mother said. He was 30 years old and lived in Manhattan.

headline.main: BILL TYNES, ARTISTIC DIRECTOR OF NEW AMSTERDAM THEATER
